feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Production variance settlement to CO-PA (instead of Cost center)
entry.content:
In S4HC Public by standard the production variance settlement (PRD) is posted against a profitability segment (CO-PA), whose profit center corresponds to the one maintained in the material master of the product manufactured. 

In S4HANA on-premise, we could configure the settlement so that a cost center (we called it "technical prices") was the receiver of the production variances (PRD), and when CKMLCP is executed, the PRY postings are made against that cost center, and together with the rest of PRD posting and other ML operations (transaction keys), the balance was 0 at period-end closing. If there was any balance in any material due to non-assigned/distributed price differences, we could easily assess them to CO-PA using allocation cycles. 

However, in S4HC Public, since the production variance (PRD) is posted against a PSG, the remaining amount in the "technical prices" cost center corresponds to that production variances + if there are any non-allocated/distributed balances, so that no automatic CO-PA allocation can be done, forcing the client to do manual posting to CO-PA (substracting manually the production variances amount) and besides we fail to the premise that all cost centers must be cleared out at period-end closing so that FI and CO result is the same.

How are you dealing with this matter in other clients? Can I do some kind of substitution to change PSG to cost center? Could SAP release the custo point to change the settlement as in on-premise? 

Thanks. Regards,

entry.title: SAP TRM Migration to Public Cloud – Cash Flow Transaction/Facility Object Missing?
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I’m currently working on a migration project involving SAP TRM (Treasury and Risk Management) in the public cloud, and I’m looking for insights from anyone who has experience with this.

From the migration object list, I noticed that Interest Rate Instrument (IRI) and Letter of Credit (LoC) are included, which is great. However, I couldn’t find any mention of Cash Flow Transaction/Facility as a migration object.

Before I proceed further, I wanted to ask:

  • Has anyone here have an experience in migrating TRM objects to the public cloud?
  • Specifically, did you encounter the same issue with Cash Flow Transaction/Facility not being listed?
  • If this object is indeed not supported in the standard migration cockpit, did you end up using LSMW or another workaround?
  • Any lessons learned or recommendations would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Alternative to ECC Cost Planning Transactions (KP06, KP26, KSPI, KSII) in S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
We are migrating from SAP ECC to SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition.

In ECC, we use the following transactions for cost rate calculation:
- KP06: Cost input
- KP26: Quantity input
- KSPI: Unit price calculation
- KSII

We understand that in S/4HANA Public Cloud, the recommended apps are:
- F3162: Manage Cost Rates - Plan
- F3422: Manage Cost Rates - Actual

Questions:
1. Can we still use KP06, KP26, KSPI, KSII transactions in S/4HANA Public Cloud?
2. What functionalities are NOT available with F3162 and F3422 compared to the ECC transactions?
3. Our current process calculates the following standard rates using KP06/KP26/KSPI:
- Standard labor rate
- Standard factory overhead rate
- Standard subcontracting rate
- Standard product overhead rate
- Post-process common overhead rate

Can we achieve the same calculations using F3162/F3422 in S/4HANA Public Cloud?

entry.title: Automatic GL Account Substitution Based on Cost Center and GL Account in S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
We are migrating from SAP ECC to SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition.

Current ECC Process:
When posting costs to specific Cost Centers and GL Accounts, the system automatically converts and posts to designated GL accounts based on a conversion table.

Business Rules:
1. If Cost Center = R&D Department → automatically post to "Research & Development Expenses" GL account
2. If Cost Center = SGA AND GL Account = 9XX (SGA accounts) → automatically post to "Selling, General & Administrative Expenses (for P&L display)" GL account

Conversion happens in real-time during posting using a custom conversion table (Cost Center + GL Account → Target GL Account).

Questions:
1. Is this type of automatic GL account substitution possible in S/4HANA Public Cloud?
2. If yes, which app or scope item should we use?
3. What is the recommended approach for this requirement in S/4HANA Public Cloud?

entry.title: Best practice for changing the default currency of analytical Fiori Tiles in S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Dear Ladies and Gentlemen,

I found an read some SAP notes for my task of changing the default currency of analytical Fiori Tiles in S/4HANA Public Cloud, but I am not really sure, what is the best practice and the easyest way to do this.

The user profile settings for language and the default values > General > Display Currency obviously have no effect on the analytical tiles for example in the space "Accounts receivable" > Analytics (there was also a note that this just works for some tiles)

Also there does not seem to be another globel setting for the S/4HANA tenants to change the standard currency for all tiles from USD to EUR as far as I see?

So the only way really seems to be to user the "Manage KPIs and Reports" app auf S/4HANA Public Cloud and change the default currency the in the settings of each indivdual KPI (for eacht tile) and then transport this?

And probably now in S/4HANA Public Cloud I can do this directly in the KPIs provided by SAP without the need to copy each tile and KPI and create custom versions for currency = EUR for all those tiles (as it was proposed in earlier S/4HANA on premise versions)? And those settings will not be overwritten with the next S/4HANA cloud release?

Thanks a lot and kind regards


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Internal Order Alternative in S/4HANA Public Cloud - Which Scope Item for BS Account Posting and Inv
entry.content:
In ECC, we use Internal Orders for:

1. Posting costs to BS accounts (e.g., Work in Process, Advances)
- Pool costs temporarily before allocation
- Code starting with "3"

2. Posting costs directly to P&L accounts (e.g., Cost Variances)
- Immediate expense recognition
- Code starting with "4"

3. Issuing inventory materials to these orders

We understand Internal Orders are not available in S/4HANA Public Cloud.

Questions:
1. Which Scope Item(s) can replace Internal Order functionality?
- We checked 35E (R&D Project Management) but it seems to support only P&L posting

2. Can any Scope Item support:
- Posting to BS accounts for cost pooling?
- Direct material issues from inventory?

3. What is the recommended approach for our requirements?

Current usage:
- Manufacturing industry
- R&D department uses these for expense management
- Need to pool costs in BS accounts before period-end allocation

entry.title: Need to update HSN code in PR/PO during creation from ARIBA Guided Buying to SAP S4HANA PUBLIC CLOUD
entry.content:
Dear All,

We are trying to integrate PR from ARIBA GUIDED BUYING to SAP S4HANA PUBLIC CLOUD and further create PO.

We have created PR in SAP S4HANA PUBLIC CLOUD. Further using Automatic PO creation app, we are creating PO. 

For india country, we have BR_NCM field for HSN code in PO item. But the same field is not available in PR item. How we can achieve this updating of HSN/SAC code in PO India tab from ARIBA GB.

Is there anyway, can we directly initiate creation of PO from ARIBA GB ? If no, what we can do for HSN code field?

Regards

Sudharsanan

entry.title: Error during creation of business partner from ARIBA SLP to S4HANA
entry.content:
Hi All

I am getting below error message during creation of vendor in S4HANA PUBLIC CLOUD from ARIBA SLP.

Error - Entry VN does not exist in TPAR (check entry)

Error - In table TPAER, the entry SUPL VN is missing

Error - Mandatory functions not yet fully maintained

Partner role VN maintain in below configurations

1) Permissible partner per account group

2) Define supplier partner determination procedure

3) Assign partner schema to vendor account group

4) Define VN in Purchasing document partner determination procedure

5) Assign partner schema to PO document type

Kindly advice on this issue

Regards

Sudharsanan

entry.content:

If so, does the Classification data of the Material need to affected in any transaction data like PO, GRN and so on.. to develop a Custom report ?. 

Best regards,

Dinesh

entry.title: Margin Analysis Allocation context error - Not authorized to perform the action MANAGE_ALLOC_V2/057
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

Does anybody know why the following error message pop-ups when creating an allocation cycle with context "Margin Analysis" in the app "Manage allocations"?

Not authorized to perform the action (MANAGE_ALLOC_V2/057)

In the starter system it worked perfectly. We are about to open a note to SAP because we fulfill all the requirements and in fact the mentioned object we have it as unrestricted.

Thanks. Regards,

entry.title: workflow approval process
entry.content:
Hello experts,

 

As we are using Public cloud for creating a purchase request for users we have created a BTP workflow approval before it reaches to SAP .

 

However, after the approval process done from Btp same people have to approve also for purchase order for that it happens double the time and creating kind of double work for approvers.

 

Is there any way that we can restrict the approval process for Purchase requested that comes from only  Btp after approval

entry.title: TR Release Warning - FOT_COMMON037 during Tax Code Creation
entry.content:
Hi,

I am currently trying to create a new Tax Code for VAT  in "Define Tax Codes for Sales and Purchases " Customizing, but when I try to create the new tax code, the system show the message "Transport request DA4K900003 must be released before changes are allowed. Message no. FOT_COMMON037".

This specific Transport Request (DA4K900003) is associated with "BC Initial Scope" configuration. Before releasing the TR, I performed a consistency control, which generated a long list of warning messages, including:

Requests could not be read
No entries found. See long text.
No transport entries available for object FINSV_FICO_CURRC and type V.
Final Status of the B-Inp Session will be read; expect longer runtime
Subobject ANLAGENNR does not exist
Interval limit starts with a special character. Interval AUFTRAG INTERVAL
No transport entries available for object V_T8G30B and type V.
No transport entries available for object V_T8G41B and type V.
No transport entries available for object V_TB038 and type V.
No transport entries available for object V_TKA01_GD and type V.
No transport entries available for object V_TKA02 and type V.
No transport entries available for object V_TKA09_CL and type V.

My main concern is: What are the potential consequences of releasing this Transport Request (TR) while these warning messages are present?

Is it generally safe to proceed with the release in this context (BC Initial Scope TR), or do these warnings indicate a significant risk of missing configuration or data inconsistency that could lead to errors in the target system?

Any guidance on this particular error (FOT_COMMON037) or the warnings would be highly appreciated.

 

Thank you in advance for your insights.
Best regards,
An

Thanks,

Emmanuel.

entry.title: Multiple Questions Regarding SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Features for Japanese Manufacturing Company
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,
We are currently implementing SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud for a Japanese manufacturing company and have several questions regarding standard functionality. We would appreciate your guidance on the following points:

1. ISO20022 Format Support for Foreign Remittance
We currently output remittance data and upload it to the bank's web banking system for foreign payments.

Question: Does the remittance data output support ISO20022 format?


2. Manufacturing Cost Report (Cost of Goods Manufactured Statement)

Question: Is it possible to output a Manufacturing Cost Report as a standard feature?
If not available as standard, what alternative solutions would you recommend (e.g., custom reports, SAP Analytics Cloud, API integration)?


3. Financial Statements Operation for Japanese Companies
We need to understand best practices and localization support for Japanese accounting requirements.
Questions:

Are there Japanese-localized versions of standard financial statements available in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud?
How do other Japanese companies typically operate financial statements, including configuration, output methods, and workflows for the following:

Balance Sheet (BS)
Profit & Loss Statement (PL)
Journal Entries (仕訳帳)
General Ledger (総勘定元帳)
Other required financial statements for Japanese GAAP compliance

 


4. Customer Invoice Creation - Transaction Date and PDF Attachment
Regarding customer invoice creation in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud:
① Actual Transaction Date

Current situation (SAP ECC): We can only retrieve and output the "invoice issue date" (document date), not the actual transaction date
Desired requirement: We need to retrieve and output the actual transaction date (the date when the transaction occurred) on customer invoices
This is required under the accrual basis accounting principle
Question: Is it possible to capture and output the actual transaction date in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud?

② PDF Document Storage

Question: Can SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud store, manage, and output invoice PDF files as supporting documents/proof of transaction?


Any guidance, documentation links, or best practice recommendations would be greatly appreciated.
Thank you in advance for your support.
Best regards,

entry.title: Test equipment management in S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition
entry.content:
Hi QM Experts,

I am looking for a best practice process for test equipment management in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud. Has anyone already gained experience in this area? I think this process is not available in Public Cloud Edition.

The inspection typ 14 is also not  available in Standard Edition.

Thank you for your feedback!

Regards Sam.

entry.title: Difference in Business Partner Tabs Between PRD and TEST system
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

We are facing a inconsistency between our PRD and TEST environments related to the display of the Business Partner (BP).

Description:

In PRD, when displaying the Business Partner. We can see the tabs Company Codes and Purchasing Organizations under the Business Partner role.

However, in TEST, for the same BP grouping and category, these tabs are tabs are not visible. We only  see the Basic Data, Address, Roles, Bank Accounts, and Attachments are visible.

Could anyone please suggest why there is a difference in the BP tabs display between the PRD and TEST systems?
Thank you
